content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs. However, it's possible that both factors play a role in the resurgence of past eras in fashion and music. On one hand, it's certainly true that pop culture is saturated with a vast amount of content and that it can be challenging to come up with something entirely original. On the other hand, the cyclical nature of trends means that styles and ideas that were popular in the past may come back around and be seen as fresh or new again. Additionally, with advancements in technology and social media, it's easier for people to access information on the past and develop an interest in vintage or retro styles, contributing to the popularity of aesthetics from previous eras. Ultimately, the reasons for the resurgence of past eras may be multifaceted and complex.
